ygData.subject: RE: [EQCheats] Bindings...
ygData.msgSnippet: sorry, you can still migrate the .opt file.  I have had my A and D keys bound to slot 1 and 2 since release.  I use it for sense heading, forage, corpse, loc,
ygData.messageBody:
sorry, you can still migrate the .opt file. I have had my A and D keys
bound to slot 1 and 2 since release. I use it for sense heading, forage,
corpse, loc, whatever... just never any spell or autoattack. I am heading
out of town from work but will post my option file on sunday or monday.

-----Original Message-----
From: Jason Harrell [mailto:jharrell@...]
Sent: Friday, July 07, 2000 9:32 AM
To: EQCheats@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Bindings...


that was 'fixed' a long time ago (like last March).

-----Original Message-----
From: Sinchi Yahuar [mailto:SinchiYahuar@...]
Sent: Friday, July 07, 2000 8:39 AM
To: EQCheats@egroups.com
Subject: [EQCheats] Bindings...


I heard somewhere you were able to bind a skill (say forage or sense
heading) with one of your movement keys. Is this possible and if so
how is it done?
Thanks
Sinchi
